SEARCH
Package model

Class ControllerPro

java.lang.Object
model.ControllerPro
public class ControllerPro extends Object
The `ControllerPro` class is responsible for managing projects and capsules.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int
    SIZE_PROJECTS
    The size of the projects array.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ControllerPro()
    This constructor initializes a new instance of the ControllerPro class and initializes its projects array with size SIZE_PROJECTS.

  • Constructor Details

    • ControllerPro

      public ControllerPro()
      This constructor initializes a new instance of the ControllerPro class and initializes its projects array with size SIZE_PROJECTS.

  • Method Details

    • createProject

      public void createProject(String projectName, Calendar startDate, Calendar endDate, double budget, String clientManagerName, String clientManagerPhone, String managerName, String managerCellPhone, int[] monthsStage)
      This method creates a new project and adds it to the projects array.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the project to be created
      startDate - the start date of the project
      endDate - the end date of the project
      budget - the budget for the project
      clientManagerName - the name of the client manager for the project
      clientManagerPhone - the phone number of the client manager for the project
      managerName - the name of the manager for the project
      managerCellPhone - the phone number of the manager for the project
      monthsStage - an array of integers representing the duration of each stage in months

    • initProjects

      public void initProjects()
      This method initializes the projects array with empty Project objects.

    • getProject

      public Project getProject(int project)
      This method retrieves a project from the projects array.
      Parameters:
      project - the index of the project to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Project object at the specified index in the projects array

    • dateCalendar

      public Calendar dateCalendar(String date) throws ParseException
      This method converts a string representation of a date in the format "dd-MM-yyyy" to a Calendar object.
      Parameters:
      date - a string representation of the date to convert
      Returns:
      the converted Calendar object
      Throws:
      ParseException - if the date string is not in the expected format

    • consultInformationProject

      public String consultInformationProject(int index)
      Returns a String with information about the project at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the project to retrieve information about
      Returns:
      a String with information about the project

    • finishStage

      public Calendar finishStage(int project, Calendar startStage)
      Calculates the end date of a project stage and adds it to the project.
      Parameters:
      project - the index of the project to add the stage to
      startStage - the start date of the stage
      Returns:
      the end date of the stage

    • capsuleConsult

      public void capsuleConsult(String situationDescription, int capsuleType, String authorName, String authorPosition, String lessonLearned, int findProject)
      Adds a capsule of stage to the project at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      situationDescription - the description of the situation during the stage
      capsuleType - the type of capsule
      authorName - the name of the author of the capsule
      authorPosition - the position of the author of the capsule
      lessonLearned - the lesson learned during the stage
      findProject - the index of the project to add the capsule to

    • getCreatedProyects

      public int getCreatedProyects()
      Returns the number of projects created by the user, excluding the currently active project.
      Returns:
      an integer value representing the number of created projects, excluding the currently active project.
